content.question: In a different experiment, cells are treated with a chemical mutagen that causes only nucleotide substitutions in DNA. Predict the likely results of a comet assay for this treatment.

frqParts.text: In a different experiment, cells are treated with a chemical mutagen that causes only nucleotide substitutions in DNA. Predict the likely results of a comet assay for this treatment.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
